Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Veronica won't even tell *me* who paid for Pam's new house!#$e#I pretend I'm mad at her but secretly I'm glad she's so loyal to her word...$h
Entries.Sun4: There was this one time I came across a very strange egg. Before I could do any tests, apparently Veronica had found it and used it for mayonnaise.#$b#I know everyone has their own tastes, but...$a#$b#I think Veronica might be the only person in the world who enjoyed eating that strange substance.$0

Entries.fall_Tue4: Veronica is the "fun" aunt. At least for Sebastian, but we have very little in common.#$b#Still, she supports me where others often don't.$s

Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: @, did you hear? Someone paid Veronica to build Pam and Penny a house! Veronica won't tell me who it was, though.#$e#Regardless of who paid, I love seeing this kind of community support in Pelican Town!$h

Entries.fallMountain: My sister and I didn't get along so well growing up. But ever since she came to help with the business, we've had a much better relationship.
Entries.winterForest: I've never been all that into fantasy or adventure. Well, not more so than an average person. But Veronica really loves it.#$b#Veronica wasn't embarrassed to let others know how dorky she was. For better and for worse.$2
Entries.summerBeach: Veronica puts up a happy front, but leaving on your own for the city at 18 doesn't lead to the easiest of lives.#$b#It may have been a selfish request on my part for her to come to Stardew Valley, but ever since then she seems a lot happier.#$b#Thank you for being her friend.$1

Entries.fall_22: Don't tell my aunt, but I found some extremely rare Star Fighters goodies online to give her for her birthday.

Entries.Resort: Wow, look at these structures!$h#$b#I can tell they were made by a master builder. I'm really impressed!
Entries.Resort_Shore: Hey, look! I can see another island from here.
Entries.Resort_Chair:
Hey @.
  						#$q 5959/5960 resortquestion_followup#I wish we had enough time to watch the sunset together, don't you?
  							#$r 5959 0 resortquestion_yes#Of course.
  							#$r 5960 0 resortquestion_no#I'd rather we watched the sunrise.
Entries.resortquestion_yes: Ah, maybe one day we'll get the free time.$1
Entries.resortquestion_no: That sounds, fun, if we had the time.$2
Entries.resortquestion_followup:
$p 5959 
  							#When we get the time, let's watch the sunset together.$1
  							|Sunset or sunrise, I could spend all week here with you on vacation. Unfortunately, real life calls.$1

Entries.resortquestion_no: Let's watch the sunrise, then.$2#$b#On second thought, maybe not.$2#$b#I don't like sand, it's coarse and rough and irritating and it gets everywhere.$3

Entries.32390214/f Robin 1000/t 600 1000/w sunny: none/24 34/Robin 24 34 2 farmer 15 40 1/skippable/showFrame Robin 16/animate Robin false true 1500 17 16/pause 400/move farmer 0 -6 0/move farmer 8 0 2/pause 1500/stopAnimation Robin 16/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1 false/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 1000/speak Robin "Nothing like fresh mountain air.$1"/pause 800/speak Robin "So what brings you up here so early in the morning, @?"/playMusic desolate/animate Robin false false 1200 17 16/emote farmer 8/pause 2500/speak Robin "You don't know either, huh?#$b#You want to know something then? I lived in the city for a long time.$2#$b#I guess you can relate, @."/animate Robin false false 1200 17 16/pause 1500/speak Robin "When I'm up here, I feel at peace. I can focus on my carpentry. And I like the relative isolation.$4"/pause 1000/speak Robin "Growing up I was always teased for my interests.$2#$b#And when I became an adult, I thought that would end.$3#$b#But I was often the only woman on a construction site back in the city, which led to far more harassment than I'd have imagined.$3"/animate Robin false false 1200 17 16/pause 1500/speak Robin "When Robin asked me to come out here and help tend the carpentry business, I thought it'd be nice to escape from the city.#$b#But I'm not sure the people here actually like me. Even though they smile to my face, are they poking fun at me behind my back?$2"/pause 1000/question fork2 "Do you think I fit in here?#Of course!#Veronica, lots of us feel like that from time to time. Stardew is a better place because you're in it.#I didn't want to say anything, but... You're right, no one likes you."/fork jerk/speak Robin "Really?!$2"/animate Robin false false 1200 17 16/pause 1500/faceDirection Robin 3 false/pause 600/jump Robin 5/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 2 false/pause 600/speak Robin "I'm glad to have...$2"/faceDirection Robin 3 false/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 2 false/pause 500/speak Robin "A good friend.$1"/faceDirection Robin 3 false/pause 400/faceDirection Robin 2 false/pause 400/faceDirection Robin 3 false/pause 400/faceDirection Robin 2 false/pause 400/question null " #I know.#Me, too.#We're all happy to have you as our neighborhood friend."/pause 1500/end

Entries.MapPage.cs.11095: Home of Veronica, Demetrius, Sebastian & Maru
Entries.ResourceCollectionQuest.cs.13674: Hello! It's Veronica. Could someone bring me {0} pieces of {1}? They need to be fresh... that means gathered today. Thanks!

Entries.NPC.cs.3926: Be patient, I still have a lot of work to do. If Robin were to help out, it might be done a little quicker.
Entries.NPC.cs.3927: Your house should be ready tomorrow. I'm sure you and Robin are eager to have the place to yourself again.

Entries.Farm_RobinWorking_ReadyTomorrow: Your new {0} will be finished tomorrow! I bet you and Robin are pretty excited!
Entries.Farm_RobinWorking1: Your new {0} will be ready in {1} days. Do you mind if I stay for dinner tonight?
Entries.Mines_PlayerKilled_Robin: ...I found you unconscious in the mines. Robin was on the verge of tears when you didn't come home.#$b#She asked me to search the mines to make sure you were okay.#$b#Be a little more careful next time, for both of your sakes, okay?$s

Entries.Robin: Hey there!^I had some extra wood lying around... I thought maybe you could use it. Take care!  ^   -Veronica %item object 388 50 %%
Hey there!^I had some extra wood lying around... I thought maybe you could use it. Take care!  ^   -Veronica %item id (O)388 50 %%[#]A Gift From Robin
Entries.RobinCooking: Dear @,^here is an old recipe that my grandma passed down to me. Enjoy!   ^   -Veronica%item cookingRecipe %%
Dear @,^here is an old recipe that my grandma passed down to me. Enjoy!   ^   -Veronica%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Robin's Family Recipe
Entries.robinKitchenLetter: Dear Farmer @,^^I'd like to apologize for joking about your Grandpa's old cottage when we first met. It's really a nice little house!^^However, you might need some more space someday. That's where I can help. If you bring me some raw materials and pay a fee, I can expand your house.^(Continued on next page)^^The first expansion I offer includes a kitchen. With a kitchen, you'll be able to cook any recipes you've learned!^^Anyway, I hope you're starting to feel at home in Stardew Valley!^^    Your local carpenter,^        Veronica[#]Robin's Services
Entries.incubator: Dear @,^^Thank you for purchasing a coop upgrade! In addition to doubling the capacity of your coop, I've taken the liberty of installing an incubator. ^To use the incubator, simply place an egg inside. If you have space left in your coop, the egg will hatch in several days!^^As always, thanks for your business.^-Veronica[#]About The Incubator
Entries.robinWell: Veronica here!^I know there's a lot of stone scattered around your farm.^If you have a surplus, you might consider having me build a well for you.^Wells can be placed all over your farm, and serve as convenient places to refill your watering can.^^Just swing by my shop with 75 stones and 1000g when you're ready for it.^-Veronica[#]Build A Well
Entries.spring_11_1: MISSING:^I lost my favorite Axe! If you find it, please return ASAP. I'm having a tough time without it. There's 250g in it for whoever finds the thing.^   -Veronica%item quest 100 %%[#]Robin Lost Her Axe
Entries.winter_21_1: @-^How are you doing? Hope the winter hasn't been too hard on you.^Anyway, I'm writing to ask you for some hardwood. I need about ten pieces, if you've got it.^If not, no worries. Take Care!^  -Veronica%item quest 113 %%[#]Robin's Request
Entries.spring_1_2: Notice:^^The price of raw materials at Veronica's shop and Clint's shop has increased.[#]Raw Material Price Notice
Entries.WoodChipper: Hey @,^^Just wanted to let you know about a new item I'm carrying... it's called a 'Wood Chipper'.^^You can use it to break hardwood into several pieces of regular wood!^^I know wood can be hard to come by in the winter, so if your supply gets low, consider picking one up.^       -Veronica[#]Wood Chipper Notice
Entries.robinResource: Hey @,^^Congratulations on completing my little challenge. I'm impressed!^^As an added bonus, I've included the blueprints for a new type of chest. Enjoy!^^-Veronica^^^^P.S. -- Now that you have all those resources laying around, why not swing by for some construction work?%item craftingRecipe Stone_Chest %%[#]Robin's Resource Rush
Entries.MarniePetAdoption: Dear @,^^From what I can tell, you've been taking really good care of your pet! I'm really happy about that!^^But there are many sweet animals that need a home... If you're interested, I'll start offering pet adoptions at my shop.^^Just be aware that there is a licensing fee, and also that each pet will want their own outdoor pet bowl area, or else they'll be unhappy. Veronica will be happy to construct additional pet bowls, for a price.^^See you soon!^-Marnie[#]Pet Adoptions Letter

Entries.7: Building/Raising Animals/Veronica, the local carpenter, lives north of town. In exchange for raw materials and money, she'll construct new buildings on your farm. You'll need her to build a coop or barn so that you can raise animals./Build a Coop./Coop/-1/100/-1/true
Entries.100: LostItem/Veronica's Lost Axe/Veronica lost her favorite axe. The last time she remembers using it, she was cutting wood south of Marnie's ranch./Find Veronica's lost axe./Robin (O)788 Forest 110 81/-1/250/-1/true/Hey, you found my axe! What a relief... I almost chopped my toe off with the other one I was using. Thank you!
Entries.113: ItemDelivery/Veronica's Request/Veronica wrote to you asking for some hardwood./Bring Veronica 10 pieces of Hardwood./Robin (O)709 10/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, you brought it! I know I can always count on you, @.$h#$b#Mmhmm... This wood is perfect. It's exactly what I need. Thanks!

Entries.788: Lost Axe/0/-300/Quest/Lost Axe/Veronica's been looking everywhere for it.

Entries.Phone_Robin_Workout: Hey, it's Veronica. I'm out of the house today for my weekly aerobics club... Sorry! *beep*
Entries.Phone_Robin_Working_OneDay: Hey, it's Veronica. I'll be out of the house until tomorrow finishing up a project. *beep*
Entries.Phone_Robin_Working: Hey, it's Veronica. I'll be busy for the next few days working on a project. *beep*
Entries.Phone_Robin_Festival: Hey, it's Veronica. I'm taking the day off today. Sorry for the inconvenience! *beep*
Entries.Phone_Robin_Open: Hello? Hey! Yes, I'm currently open for business... please swing by before 5PM if you need anything! *click* $h
Entries.Phone_Robin_Open_Rare: Hello? Oh, hi @! *BANG*... Um, one sec... (Muffled Voice: Demetrius, could you close the door? I'm trying to run a business here.)... Sorry! Yes, I'm open until 5pm today. See you later! *click*
Entries.Phone_Robin_Closed: Hey, it's Veronica. My business hours are from 9AM to 5PM. Please come by then if you need anything! *beep*

Entries.ScienceHouse_RobinAbsent:
Sorry! Shop's closed for the day... I'm at Caroline's place for aerobics club.

-Veronica
Entries.ScienceHouse_MoneyBox: I'm on the island today, but you can still buy something. It's an honor system!^     -Veronica

Entries.Robin_Text: Hey! I have an idea for a new style of bed, but I'll need 80 hardwood to make it happen. Can anyone help?                     -Veronica
Entries.Robin_Objective_1_Text: Add the hardwood to the stockpile in Veronica's house.
Entries.Robin2_Text: I'm putting on a little promotion, just for fun. If anyone can collect 1000 pieces of {Resource:Text} in a week, they'll earn a reward. And you can keep the {Resource:Text}!             -Veronica

Entries.Character_CoopHelpString: Starting Cabins: Start with 1-3 cabins already in place, allowing your friends to join immediately. Alternatively, you can select "None" and build the cabins yourself (via Veronica).^^Cabin Layout: If you decide to start your farm with pre-existing cabins, you can choose between two layout styles: "Nearby" places all cabins near the main farmhouse, encouraging a communal farming style. "Separate" places the cabins far apart, allowing more room for independence.^^Profit Margin: Adjusts the profit margin (money you earn) on goods you sell. 'Normal' is the original Stardew Valley experience. More experienced and/or larger groups may wish to decrease the margin.

Starting Cabins: Start with 1-{0} cabins already in place, allowing your friends to join immediately. Entries.Robin: Sebastian was so cute when he was younger, he used to love the egg hunt. Then he started throwing rotten eggs...#$e#They can't stay that age forever, I guess.$2

You and Robin are so cute together!$1#$b#But if you ever break her heart, you'll wish the slimes would have devoured you in the mines instead.$3#$b#Enjoy the dance, brother!$4^Enjoy the dance, sister!$4
Ow... you stepped on my foot Demetrius.
Entries.Demetrius: This is tiring, Veronica. Are you ready to visit the buffet soon? *pant*

Entries.Robin: Robin's such an amazing carpenter. She made that little candle-boat out there. Of course she learned everything she knows from me.$1
Seeing you two makes me want to find someone myself. It gets lonely, being single. If he'd only...$2#$b#What? I didn't say anything. Just forget that last part, okay.$4

Entries.Leah_spouse_y2: Hey, Veronica is teaching me some innovative techniques this year.#$e#I'll have to show you later...$1
Entries.Leah_y2: I think Veronica and I make a pretty good team, don't you think?

Entries.Robin: Back when we were teenagers, Robin and I dressed up for Spirit's Eve as our favorite Star Fighters characters. I was Princess Star and she dressed up as The Skyborn.#$b#We got some odd looks but it was probably the best Spirit's Eve we ever had.$1

Entries.Robin_y2: Welp... Demetrius got me a new power saw this year...$6#$b#He must've forgotten that he got my sister the same thing two years ago!$6

Entries.Robin: Robin looks really happy! That's the best gift I could receive. Thank you. Come join us when you're ready -- you are family, after all!

BeforeMovie.Text: I'm so excited! This movie looks amazing!$h

AfterMovie.Text: You know that scene, where... Oh, I'm rambling again huh? I guess that's because I had such an amazing time. Thanks @!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: It doesn't really look like my kind of movie, but it can be fun to try new things.

AfterMovie.Text: That was a lot of fun, @. Thanks for broadening my taste in movies.

Entries.32390214/f Robin 1000/t 600 1000/w sunny: none/24 34/Robin 25 34 2 farmer 15 40 1/skippable/showFrame Robin 16/animate Robin false true 1500 17 16/pause 400/move farmer 0 -6 0/move farmer 9 0 2/pause 1500/stopAnimation Robin 16/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 1 false/pause 1000/faceDirection farmer 2 true/pause 1000/speak Robin "Nothing like fresh mountain air.$1"/pause 800/speak Robin "So what brings you up here so early in the morning, @?"/playMusic desolate/animate Robin false false 1200 17 16/emote farmer 8/pause 2500/speak Robin "You don't know either, huh?#$b#You want to know something then? I lived in the city for a long time.$2#$b#I guess you can relate, @."/animate Robin false false 1200 17 16/pause 1500/speak Robin "When I'm up here, I feel at peace. I can focus on my carpentry. And I like the relative isolation.$4"/pause 1000/speak Robin "Growing up I was always teased for my interests.$2#$b#And when I became an adult, I thought that would end.$3#$b#But I was often the only woman on a construction site back in the city, which led to far more harassment than I'd have imagined.$3"/animate Robin false false 1200 17 16/pause 1500/speak Robin "When Robin asked me to come out here and help tend the carpentry business, I thought it'd be nice to escape from the city.#$b#But I'm not sure the people here actually like me. Even though they smile to my face, are they poking fun at me behind my back?$2"/pause 1000/question fork2 "Do you think I fit in here?#Of course!#Veronica, lots of us feel like that from time to time. Stardew is a better place because you're in it.#I didn't want to say anything, but... You're right, no one likes you."/fork jerk/speak Robin "Really?!$2"/animate Robin false false 1200 17 16/pause 1500/faceDirection Robin 3 false/pause 600/jump Robin 5/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 2 false/pause 600/speak Robin "I'm glad to have...$2"/faceDirection Robin 3 false/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 2 false/pause 500/speak Robin "A good friend.$1"/faceDirection Robin 3 false/pause 400/faceDirection Robin 2 false/pause 400/faceDirection Robin 3 false/pause 400/faceDirection Robin 2 false/pause 400/question null " #I know.#Me, too.#We're all happy to have you as our neighborhood friend."/pause 1500/end

Entries.event-75160190.06: Just a second, now, we're all in this together.$h##$b#Restoring the minecart system would also allow you to easily travel around the village!$h#$b#Who knows? Riding around a minecart as a way to travel might even be fun!$h#$b#I'll handle the funding for the restoration, though we'd still need the supplies.#$b#Now that's where you'll come in.$h#$b#I've enlisted Veronica's help, and she has given me a list of the required supplies.$h
Entries.event-75160191.07: That's fantastic news!#$b#Thank you so much, Veronica, Clint and Ian.$h
Entries.Ian.Dialogue.Fri8: I helped Veronica build your renovation.#$b#Knowing it was for you, I tried my best!$h#$b#Only the finest service for my best friend.$h
Entries.Ian.Dialogue.Fri8.dating: I helped Veronica build your renovation.#$b#Knowing it was for you, I tried my best!$h
Entries.Maddie.Dialogue.Tue6: I saw Demetrius at the saloon last night. He was dancing his heart out with Veronica!$9#$b#Quite literally, actually. He looked exhausted afterwards!$h
Entries.Sean.Dialogue.Tue: Ian is working for Veronica tomorrow. Maybe I'll swing by and see what Demetrius is doing. He's always got something new brewing.
